about_the_game: An iconic, much-loved vehicle, one of the last of the powerful rear-wheel drive racing cars: the Opel Kadett GTE from the '70s. Adrenaline and courage will be your driving companions!
detailed_description: An iconic, much-loved vehicle, one of the last of the powerful rear-wheel drive racing cars: the Opel Kadett GTE from the '70s. Adrenaline and courage will be your driving companions!

name: Gravel Free car Opel Kadett GTE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500, AMD FX-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more / AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600, AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: An iconic, much-loved vehicle, one of the last of the powerful rear-wheel drive racing cars: the Opel Kadett GTE from the '70s. Adrenaline and courage will be your driving companions!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
